CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Complete the first lesson stage positioned above or below the Complete the assignment stage?
SRP.A: The Complete the first lesson stage is positioned {above} the Complete the assignment stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Register Courses?
VE.A: The value of stage Register Courses is {51%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete the assignment?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete the assignment is {24%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Register Learning Platform?
VE.A: The value of stage Register Learning Platform is {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Register Learning Platform, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete the assignment, with a value of {24%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Complete the first lesson to stage Complete the assignment?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Complete the first lesson to stage Complete the assignment is {5%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses is {49%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 26%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Register Learning Platform} stage has {100%}, the {Register Courses} stage has {51%}, the {Complete the first lesson} stage has {29%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 75%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Register Courses} stage has {51%}, the {Complete the first lesson} stage has {29%}, the {Complete the assignment} stage has {24%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 26% and 75%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Register Courses} stage has {51%}, the {Complete the first lesson} stage has {29%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, or from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Learning Platform} to {Register Courses} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Learning Platform} to stage {Register Courses} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Register Learning Platform} and {Register Courses} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete the first lesson} and {Complete the assignment} stages.
